member.name: M:McModAPIVersions.McForge.GetMDKDownloadLink(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return download link to the targetted Minecraft Forge MDK
member.example: To download Minecraft Forge MDK version 35.1.37 for Minecraft 1.16.4, calling the function like this : GetMDKDownloadLink("1.16.4", "35.1.37");
member.returns: Download link to the targetted Minecraft Forge MDK
member.exception: Thrown when no download link has been found

member.name: M:McModAPIVersions.McForge.GetInstallerDownloadLink(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return download link to the targetted Minecraft Forge Installer
member.example: To download Minecraft Forge Installer version 35.1.37 for Minecraft 1.16.4, calling the function like this : GetInstallerDownloadLink("1.16.4", "35.1.37");
member.returns: Download link to the targetted Minecraft Forge Installer
member.exception: Thrown when no download link has been found
